textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Robert I was shooting on a tripod so I had the IBIS off.I don't think it should make a difference,but I will try it tomorrow just to make sure.Thanks for the advice. http://www.pictureshow.nl/ If i'm remembering correctly, was there not a different maximum synctime with IBS on or off? this was with the 700 and the 77.
